_description: Riddles concealing names of ladies — in couplets

Bod608.First Lines:
Chyldern profytt & lycor faylyngSo hyght my trew loue with
                    owten lesyng…
Bod608.Last Lines:
…Water frosyn & caym is brotherSo hyght my trew loue &
                    non other
Bod608.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Isabel: A Riddling Mistress.” 
             English Language Notes
         1 (1963-64): 1-4: 2.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 567.
